name: gizmodo (08/09/07)
description:
Since there are a lot of things in common with the kotaku stylesheet, a made a gizmodo style too :D

Pretty simple ad-removal, cleaner and some little tweaks.

v 0.1
First Release - Updated on August 19, 2007.
topTags in dark orange
